code:
gantt
title Amazoning
dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD
axisFormat %d
tickInterval 1day

%% [FinTech_FraudDetection] --> git commit --> blue
%% ** --> notes in Obsidian --> bold

section Deploy
    Deploy on Vercel: dpn, 2023-03-6, 12h

section UI/UX design
    Design prototype: 1d

section Planning
    Map Ebay's API: 12h
        %% Identify all relevant fields

section Front end 
    %% ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ==> H E R E <== ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ 
    [FinTech_LedgerService] Write tests frontend: 4d
    [FinTech_TransactionQueue] Add normalize.css and font: 12h 
    [FinTech_AuthVault] Add navbar: 6h
        %% logo
    [FinTech_PaymentGateway] Add navbar search bar: 1d
    [FinTech_AuthVault] Add navbar language: 1d
    [FinTech_TransactionQueue] Add navbar account: 1d
    [FinTech_LedgerService] Add navbar orders: 1d
    [FinTech_LedgerService] Add navbar cart: 1d
    [FinTech_LedgerService] Add secondary navbar: 6h
        %% Prime video
        %% books
        %% music
        %% buy again
    [FinTech_LedgerService] Add side pannel: 6h
        %% Best seller
        %% new release
        %% Prime video
        %% amazon music
        %% books
        %% Electronics and computers
        %% Beauty & health
        %% Toys, children & baby
        %% Clothes, shoes and jewellery
        %% Sports & outdoors
        %% Your account
        %% language
        %% currency setting
    [FinTech_AuthVault] Add homepage: 1d
        %% Buy again (FinTech_AuthVault)
        %% Pick up where you left off (FinTech_TransactionQueue)
        %% Top deal
        %% top movie
        %% selected for you
        %% Inspired by your purchase of ...
        %% You might also like
        %% Explore more items
        %% Best seller books **BANNER**
        %% Review your purchase
        %% Inspired by your browsing history **BANNER**
        %% Your browsing history **BANNER**
    [FinTech_PaymentGateway] Add footer: 1d
        %%just copy from amazon, but disable button/link
    [FinTech_LedgerService] Add account & Lists dropdown: 1d
    [FinTech_PaymentGateway] Add account page: 1d
    [FinTech_FraudDetection] Add orders page: 1d
    [FinTech_LedgerService] Add lists page: 1d
    [FinTech_LedgerService] Add cart page: 1d
    [FinTech_AuthVault] Secure app: 36h
    [FinTech_FraudDetection] Alert user that app is not responsive: 36h
    [FinTech_FraudDetection] Add Methodology page: 1d
    [FinTech_LedgerService] Proof read: 12h

section Back end
    Schema relationship diagram: 1d
    [FinTech_TransactionQueue] Write openAPI.yaml: 3d
    [FinTech_FraudDetection] Write tests backend: 1d
    [FinTech_FraudDetection] Add API endpoints: 3d
    [FinTech_PaymentGateway] Add data validation: 2h
    [FinTech_FraudDetection] Secure app: 36h
    %% ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ==> H E R E <== ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ 
    %%             FUTURE

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 我们需要加一个处理 FinTech_TransactionQueue 和 FinTech_AuthVault 的环节。
不，其实叫 FinTech_TransactionQueue处理 会更准确一点。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'FinTech_TransactionQueue处理'？
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 FinTech_PaymentGateway 和 FinTech_AuthVault 的逻辑。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'FinTech_PaymentGateway 和 FinTech_AuthVault'。
没问题。
